short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scan Barcode and manage inventory. We support Google Drive and Spreadsheets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly Scan multiple Barcode. The result can be stored as text files or Google Spreadsheet files. You can also use the app to manage your inventory products, import and export.

We support EAN, CODE 128, CODE 39, EAN 8, UPC-A, UPC-C, I2of5, 2of5, CODE 93 and CODABAR.
